fullText: Though it offers some effective scares and a few good laughs, 'Grey House' never finds the through line that might connect its scattered frights into a coherent emotional experience.
dtliExcerpt: Though it offers some effective scares and a few good laughs, 'Grey House' never finds the through line that might connect its scattered frights into a coherent emotional experience.
